10 READA
20 IFA=-1THENSC=0:GOTO10
30 IFA=-2THENSC=256:GOTO10
40 IFA=-3THENGOSUB110:GOTO10
50 IFA=-4THENRESTORE:GOTO200
60 IFA=-5THENREADA:GOSUB120:GOTO10
70 IFA=-6THENREADB,C,D:GOSUB140:GOTO10
80 IFA>=0THENA=A+SC:PS=A:READA:FN=A
90 POKE16384+PS,FN
100 GOTO 10
110 FORZ=1TO100:NEXTZ:RETURN
120 IFA<9THENCLSA:RETURN
130 POKE49151,A:RETURN
140 POKE49151,64:FORA=B+16384TOC+16384:POKEA,96:NEXTA:RETURN
200 A$(1)="ŽÁÂ":B$(1)="ÁÉÆÂ":C$(1)="ÄÆÉÈ":D$(1)="‹ÄÈ‡"
205 O=1:FORQ=0TO3STEP3:FORZ=1+QTO3+Q
210 FORA=1TO4:C=ASC(MID$(A$(1),A,1)):IFC>143THENC=C+(16*Z):IFC>255THENC=C-96
211 A$(1+Z)=A$(1+Z)+CHR$(C):NEXT
220 FORA=1TO4:C=ASC(MID$(B$(1),A,1)):IFC>143THENC=C+(16*Z):IFC>255THENC=C-96
221 B$(1+Z)=B$(1+Z)+CHR$(C):NEXT
230 FORA=1TO4:C=ASC(MID$(C$(1),A,1)):IFC>143THENC=C+(16*Z):IFC>255THENC=C-96
231 C$(1+Z)=C$(1+Z)+CHR$(C):NEXT
240 FORA=1TO4:C=ASC(MID$(D$(1),A,1)):IFC>143THENC=C+(16*Z):IFC>255THENC=C-128
241 D$(1+Z)=D$(1+Z)+CHR$(C):NEXT
250 NEXT:O=O*-1:NEXT:PRINT@482,"EVERYBODY LOVES MC-HYPNOTOAD!";
255 FORC=1TO6
260 PRINT@3*32+9,B$(C+1);:PRINT@3*32+16,B$(C+1);
261 PRINT@4*32+9,C$(C+1);:PRINT@4*32+16,C$(C+1);
262 PRINT@2*32+9,A$(C);:PRINT@2*32+16,A$(C);
263 PRINT@5*32+9,D$(C);:PRINT@5*32+16,D$(C);
290 FORD=1TO10:NEXT:NEXT:GOTO255
1000 DATA-5,6
1010 DATA-6,480,511,255
1020 DATA-1,9,220,10,220,11,220,12,220,16,222,17,220,18,220,19,220,40,216,41,135
1030 DATA42,143,43,143,44,139,45,130,46,220,47,216,48,131,49,143,50,143,51,139,52,130
1040 DATA53,221,71,222,72,133,73,142,74,193,75,194,76,141,77,143,78,143,79,143,80,142
1050 DATA81,193,82,194,83,141,84,143,85,212,102,222,103,129,104,143,105,193,106,201,107,198
1060 DATA108,194,109,143,110,143,111,143,112,193,113,201,114,198,115,194,116,143,117,139,118,212
1070 DATA133,222,134,129,135,143,136,143,137,196,138,198,139,201,140,200,141,143,142,143,143,143
1080 DATA144,196,145,198,146,201,147,200,148,143,149,143,150,139,151,212,165,218,166,143,167,143
1090 DATA168,143,169,139,170,196,171,200,172,135,173,139,174,143,175,135,176,139,177,196,178,200
1100 DATA179,135,180,143,181,143,182,143,183,138,197,218,198,143,199,143,200,138,201,140,202,140
1110 DATA203,140,204,140,205,140,206,140,207,140,208,140,209,140,210,140,211,140,212,133,213,143
1120 DATA214,143,215,138,216,223,217,223,227,218,228,131,229,131,230,134,231,141,232,139,233,139
1130 DATA234,237,235,239,236,239,237,239,238,239,239,239,240,239,241,239,242,238,243,135,244,135
1140 DATA245,143,246,140,247,131,248,131,249,130,-2,3,218,4,141,5,143,6,142,7,139,8,140
1150 DATA9,141,10,139,11,236,12,188,13,188,14,188,15,188,16,188,17,236,18,135,19,143
1160 DATA20,140,21,137,22,142,23,143,24,143,25,136,36,210,37,141,38,143,39,134,40,143
1170 DATA41,143,42,141,43,143,44,143,45,143,46,143,47,143,48,143,49,143,50,141,51,143
1180 DATA52,143,53,142,54,135,55,143,56,136,57,215,69,210,70,141,71,139,72,141,73,137
1190 DATA74,137,75,143,76,143,77,143,78,143,79,143,80,143,81,143,82,139,83,137,84,141
1200 DATA85,137,86,143,87,136,88,215,102,210,103,141,104,134,105,139,106,137,107,141,108,143
1210 DATA109,143,110,143,111,143,112,143,113,143,114,137,115,137,116,142,117,135,118,136,119,215
1220 DATA135,210,136,139,137,141,138,139,139,137,140,141,141,143,142,143,143,143,144,143,145,137
1230 DATA146,137,147,143,148,137,149,138,150,215,166,222,167,129,168,139,169,132,170,140,171,136
1240 DATA172,137,173,141,174,143,175,143,176,137,177,136,178,140,179,140,180,129,181,139,182,212
1250 DATA198,129,199,136,200,138,201,137,202,213,203,129,204,141,205,137,206,213,207,129,208,141
1260 DATA209,137,210,213,211,129,212,136,213,138,214,137,215,213
1270 DATA-4
2000 REM VERSION 0.6 BETA 
2030 REM BY ROBERT SIEG
2040 REM MC-10 CLUB
2050 REM PUSH222@GMAIL.COM
2060 REM EDITS BY JIM GERRIE
